results.title: Trump launches process to secure critical mineral imports and end China's dominance
results.snippet: President Donald Trump launched a new process to secure critical mineral imports, citing national security concerns. The president signed an order on critical minerals Wednesday, following a Commerce Department Section 232 investigation of the Trade Expansion Act launched last April.
